boardgame.name: Mü _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mehr
Mü _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; More
boardgame.description: While the headline game, M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;, is the main attraction, this deck of custom cards comes with rules for several games:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml; - A complex trick-taking game. For 3-6 players, ages 12 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Last Panther - A trick-taking game similar to Hearts, where players try to avoid negative points. For 3-8 players, ages 10 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wimm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;ln - A trick-taking game where players must estimate how many tricks they will take, akin to Oh Hell!. For 3-6 players, ages 8 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rumm_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml; - A Rummy-like card laying game where players try to get rid of their hands by playing high-scoring combinations of cards. For 3-6 players, ages 8 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Safar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml; - A card _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;catching_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game using basic adding skills. For 2-4 players, ages 10 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Calcory (only in the original 1995-1998 edition) - A memory and calculation game, where players push their luck to uncover the most cards. For 2-4 players, ages 7 and up. Calcory uses wooden markers that were not packaged in subsequent releases, so the game was dropped from the set._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml; is regarded by many as one of the best offerings in the trick-taking genre. Players reveal cards to declare their bids: the highest bidder becomes the Chief and the second highest bidder is the Vice. Both the Vice and Chief choose a trump (either number or suit), and then players try to capture tricks to score the most points. The Chief chooses a partner and tries to cover the bid to score bonus points, while the Vice and remaining players seek to stop the Chief from reaching his goal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The deck consists of 60 cards in 5 different colored suits. Each suit contains cards numbered from 0 to 9, with two of each the 1 and 7 cards. Cards also have 0, 1, or 2 triangles printed on them to show the point value of that card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mü _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lots More includes a a tweaked version of M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml; and a different set of games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 131 - 100 Great Games, part 1 (with Stephen Glenn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Mark Jackson)
The Spiel #171 - If Charlemagne Was A Badger

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This game is not in shrinkwrap and the deck of cards is not wrapped. However, I think it came this way. As a habit, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t unwrap games until I play them, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve never played this. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t open decks to examine them and then put them away. So I think it must have been delivered like this. Bought new, played never, put away. My copy comes with a print out of the English rules. In excellent condition, only listed as LN as it has been opened. UK BUYERS - Very cost effective to get two or three games. MyHermes, 0-1kg starts at £2.79, but up to 10kg is from just £6.49. Adding one or two more games is very good value for you. 10kg gets you a lot of games. Happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR. Can provide photos of my copy on request (message me your email). UK - Can ship quickly cheaply by courier. Europe - Can ship quickish by Royal Mail USA / CAN - Royal Mail up to 2kg - various services and prices, ask for info. Over 2kg, ship by Parcelforce. Other locations will research when I get an order. I am looking at other options, but international couriers are expensive in the UK. On Paypal if you make payment as a cash gift to me, I am not charged a fee by Paypal (may differ if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re outside the UK) but you receive no protection in a dispute. If the Paypal payment is a commercial transaction, Paypal charges me near 4% of the payment so you get dispute protection. Of course, you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know me from a hole in the ground. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your right to protection obviously. But please consider adding a touch to the payment to help cover this fee.
